forms.row_represents: one woody stem (tree or large shrub) recorded inside the plot (individual with DBH measured in cm).
forms.empty_fields_policy: For ID/header fields left blank on subsequent rows (date, areaName, blockID, transectID, plotID, research_team) duplicate the last filled value down the column. For species_name or habit left blank mark as NA. For numeric measurements: if dbh_cm is blank mark NA (do NOT treat as 0). For phenological_condition or notes blank = NA.

forms.row_represents: one species record within a given subplot (counts of seedlings and saplings of that species in the subplot).
forms.empty_fields_policy: For ID/header fields left blank duplicate last filled value. For count columns (#seedlings, #saplings) blanks should be treated as 0 unless a separate note indicates missing data — if unsure mark NA. For species_name or habit missing = NA. Notes blank = NA.

forms.row_represents: one subplot (or plot centre measurement) recording canopy openness (by quadrant), soil moisture, temperature and pH and descriptive notes for that subplot/plot point.
forms.empty_fields_policy: For ID/header fields left blank duplicate last filled value. For canopy quadrant blank treat as 0 only if clearly intended (e.g. recorded 0 elsewhere); otherwise mark NA. canopy_total_dots can be computed from quadrant entries when missing. For soil_moisture/temperature/pH blank = NA. Notes blank = NA.
